full_text: DO NOT WEAR GLASSES COLOR PHOTOGRAPH HAIR SPECIFICATIONS 10 :00 SAMPLE PHOTOGRAPH HEAD SIZE(INCLUDING HAIR) MUST FIT INSIDE OVAL 22044 COLOR PHOTOS 22MM (7/8") HEAD WIDTH ONLY(4) @ PHOTOGRAPH MUST SHOW THE SUBJECT IN A 3/a FRONTAL PORTRAIT AS SHOWN ABOVE PHOTOGRAPH MUST NOT BE PASTED ON CARDS OR MOUNTED IN ANY WAY AND MUST BE BORDERLESS a RIGHT EAR MUST BE EXPOSED IN PHOTOGRAPH FOR ALL FOUR (4) APPLICANTS, HATS MUST NOT BE WORN IDENTICAL PHOTOGRAPHS OF EVERY APPLI- W CANT, REGARDLESS OF AGE, MUST BE SUBMITTED 1 1/4 x 1 1/2 PHOTOGRAPH MUST BE LARGER THAN BUT HEAD SIZE (INCLUDING HAIR) MUST e PHOTOGRAPHS MUST BE TAKEN WITHIN THIRTY (30) FIT WITHIN THE ILLUSTRATED OVAL DAYS OF APPLICATION DATE e PHOTOGRAPH MUST BE COLOR WITH A WHITE BACKGROUND PORTRAITS SNAPSHOTS, GROUP PICTURES, OR FULL LENGTH EQUAL IN REFLECTANCE TO BOND TYPING PAPER WILL NOT BE ACCEPTED SURFACE OF THE PHOTOGRAPH MUST BE GLOSSY e USING CRAYON OR FELT PEN.
